name: mediaROMancer: Daisuke Asakura
overview: mediaROMancer Daisuke Asakura is a multimedia fan disc for Japanese musician Daisuke Asakura. It includes a discography, interview clips, a breakdown of his studio equipment, and a plethora of photographs, video clips, and other information about him. In addition, there is also a game mode in which Asakura's manager has been kidnapped by a bandit, and Asakura must save him by hitting a specified number of targets in a whack-a-mole style minigame. Clearing stages in this minigame unlocks additional bonus video clips.
